```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
saveGIF({
  N=10
  for(i in 0:(N-1)){
    x <- cos(2*pi/N*i)
    y <- x+1
    z <- (y-2)*22.5
    pie(c(y,8-y), col=c("white","yellow"), init.angle=135-z, 
        border=FALSE, labels=NA)
    }
  }, "pacman.gif", interval = 0.1)

```
